name: Legacy Token
description: Legacy Network AG is transforming personal and professional development with its flagship product Legacy Academy, a gamified learning app that leverages blockchain-based rewards to incentivize its users. Overview -Approaching Series-B stage with a projected company valuation of $500M. -Approaching the token listing with an already launched, highly successful product and a fiat marketing budget of more than $5M. -Professional legal and compliance setup in Liechtenstein, regularly audited and regulated by the local financial market authority. -A strong focus on sustainable business practices, working with renowned partners such as Swiss banks, Ernst & Young, several law firms, KOLs etc.
